title: Home
description: Homeopathy UK is the leading UK homeopathy charity. We provide information on homeopathic medicine and offer free homeopathy clinics.
cleaned_text: Homeopathy UK We offer free or low-cost homeopathic treatment through our network of charitable clinics around the UK. [Our clinics](/treatment/clinics/) are run by highly-qualified, experienced practitioners, including doctors and nurses who use homeopathy alongside conventional medicine. Face-to-face appointments are available at our clinics in have two [Virtual Clinics (UK and Scotland).](https://homeopathy-uk.org/treatment/clinics/virtual-clinics/) Success stories Millions of people (and animals) have found their lives transformed by homeopathy. Here are some of their stories... What is Homeopathy Homeopathy treats each person as a unique individual with the aim of stimulating their own natural healing ability. Find A Homeopath Our online directory lists hundreds of homeopaths, all of whom are members of one of the main registering bodies. Use the button below to find a homeopath near you.
